Anyone looking for a money trainer, just use cheat engine. Google it. Run ME3, then alt + tab it, run cheat engine, and load up the process, which can be done on the top left. 

After you have that loaded, in the value box on the right, enter the amount of money you have and then hit new search. It should come up, use the red arrow to drop it down into the bottom box where you can right click on the value and change it to what you want.

Sometimes it takes a few searches, so search for the first number, buy something alt+tab it again and just enter the new number and hit next search.
Aside from change the money value, you can change any numeric value in the game including skill points, etc
